body_content.explanation: a small plastic toy that is bought without you knowing which one you are going to get, for example from a vending machine (= a machine from which you can buy small things by putting money into it or using a card) or from a special shop:
examples: Gachapon are usually released in sets as collectables.
You can buy your your own gachapon online and see what surprise toy you get!

body_content.explanation: in Japan, a vending machine (= a machine from which you can buy small things by putting money into it or using a card) that sells small plastic toys, one of which comes by chance out of the machine when money is put into it:
examples: Gashapon are similar to the coin-operated toy vending machines seen outside grocery stores and other retailers in other countries.
